answers.answer: I'm not / haven't done any. As far as testing for any abnormalities or anything.
Are you going to do the gst or gtt
Gst? Gtt? What is that? I'm sorry I'm a ftm
I will never have amnosintesis again the blood work said all is fine
Gestational diabetes test or glucose tolerance test and group strep b test
I always said I would never get one just reading about it sounds painful

Oh I have to take the gestational diabetes test cuss I'm already at risk for being diabetic since it runs in the FAM but now that I'm pregnant it increased it. My doctor said they usually don't give them to ppl whos bmi is under 25& mine is 19/20 but since I could have it already from not being pregnant that shed rather be safe then sorry
I see if I do end up doing it Im going to get tested through a urine sample

question: Anyone refusing prenatal tests? I only had the first panel done with my son and im considering doing the same with baby
title: refusing prenatal tests
